body.name: Buckle Toys - Bella Square - Learning Activity Game - Develop Motor Skills and Problem Solving - Travel Essential for Toddlers 1-3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 20 hrs 35 mins
features: LEARNING TOY: Our mom-approved, child-tested learning toy is the perfect aid for training your curious child, helping them explore colors, numbers, counting, & more. As a screen-free toy, Bella Square will help with your child’s curiosity & may help reduce tantrums.
SENSORY DETAILS: Teach your boy or girl early life skills with soft interactive flaps, numbers & shapes, a zipper pocket, & 6 color matching straps with different clasps. Measures 6.5” x 6.5”.
QUIET TRAVEL TOY: This therapy activities toy is a road trip essential to help keep your kids busy when you travel. It's small, quiet, & includes a zipper pocket to carry your children's belongings.
DESIGN: For toddlers & those with special needs, this happy pink plush square made of pillow like material is the best quiet toy that aids in the development of fine motor & problem solving skills.

AUTHENTIC BUCKLE TOY: Discover the original high-quality educational toddler toys. We are a trusted US-based brand. Our genuine & unique items include Sensory Squares, Busy Boards, Stuffed Animals, Backpacks, & Activity Cubes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for toddler
reviews.reviewText: This toy fits right into our diaper bag for on the go play time. This toy is great for learning fine motor skills and very colorful and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2017
reviews.reviewText: My first two kids were obsessed with the buckles on high chairs and car seats. They could sit all day with a car seat buckle and once they figured out how to get it together they would cry because they couldn't get it un done. Now I have my third who is 18 months and was showing interest a few months ago in all the things we had that buckled. I had to pull her away from another moms car seat while we were out one day and she threw such a tantrum. I accidentally found this toy on Amazon one day and on Easter morning it was in her basket. She was instantly in love. The bright colors attract her to it and she can find it when she wants it among the pile of toys in the playroom. She can easily carry it and the material is so soft I have even let her keep it in her bed when she's resting. She hasn't gotten to the point yet of being able to buckle them if they are all open. She has gotten one together a few times but I like the buckles are different for different colors to help. That will help her with color identification as she gets older. I notice if she's not around my 3 year old likes it as well. The buckles on most things he plays with are tough to get apart, like high chairs and car seats. These buckles are easy to clip without getting pinched and to get apart without becoming frustrating. This hasn't become one of the toys she looked at for a while and put aside, this is something that comes with us in the car, to the store (I like clipping it around the cart handle), to a restaurant and even just on the couch. I am so happy I found this and would definitely recommend it if your kids are into buckles like all mine were. Thank you to whoever make this!!! I guess the only thing I would say is that it's kind of pricey for what it is, but the quality is great and the entertainment time it has provided so far is definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect car toy!
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old granddaughter really enjoys this toy. She can buckle and unbuckle the straps. Great for the hand eye coordination and matching the colors. Worth the money!! Lasts through multiple children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This buckle toy will be a perfect gift.
reviews.reviewText: Cute idea and always picked as a favorite toy. It will be a hit!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: My 18 month old loves this toy! It’s great to take in the car or in stores if you have a buckle loving babe and want a cleaner alternative to shopping carts. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, well made.
reviews.reviewText: It's a good toy, well made and I think that is reflected in the price. Got as an airplane toy for one of my toddlers but of course he didn't really care for it. Still cute and will maybe put away for when he's a bit older.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who knew buckles were so fascinating?
reviews.reviewText: It’s been 30 years since I’ve had toddlers so I was pretty surprised when my toddler granddaughter suddenly because fascinated with the buckles on her high chair, stroller, and store shopping carts. I almost didn’t but this toy because it seems like she would quickly lose interest, but the other reviewers were so right about this toy holding their toddlers’ attention for a long time. I love watching her so patiently manipulate the buckles until she gets them to click. It was also great for her to learn color matching, and she’s quite fascinated with the princess and the mermaid in particular playing peekaboo under the numbered flaps. I love that she figured out which of the different types of buckles on this toy go together that are not the same color as well. Watching her play with this toy has been unexpectedly fascinating for me as well. It’s been a long time since I got to see the growth and development of babies and toddlers and I love watching her hone her fine motor skills, color skills, identifying numbers 1 through 5, and growing patience and perseverance. Whoever made this toy is a genius!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got it when daughter was around 21months and now she's 2.5yrs and still plays with it. It's great for car rides, and restaurants.
We bought this pillow when my baby was 1. She is now 15 month old and it has been amazing watching her progress while learning to buckle it. She keeps going back to it!

My daughter could spend at least 30 minutes consumed by this toy. The only bad thing about it is that it’s a little hard for a two year old to pull and buckle alone. You have to pull pretty hard to fasten them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Love this toy, my little one loves the buckles and it can keep her entertained for a good stint of time. The peep up pictures are adorable and she loves them. The soft material is a great texture and sensory experience for her too.

Bonjour, j'ai une fille handicapé et contrairement à d'autres jeux, le coussin permet une plus grande amplitude. Attaches diverses pour un apprentissage plus complet. Fermeture éclaire sur un des côtés.

Great great play toy. Little kid lives playing with clips and buckles and these are awesome. They are not impossible to do and seem to be designed for a little kid. Been 5 days and he still runs to it in the morning for a play.
